title: Trump directly involved in plans to seize voting machines -reports - Reuters
content:
1. Trump directly involved in plans to seize voting machines -reports  Reuters
  2. 'Like a child': Ex-Bush official reacts to latest Trump coup revelation  CNN
  3. The January 6 committee is looking into Trump's involvement in proposals to use federal agencies to seize voting machines: NYT  Yahoo News
  4. Trump's power grab in fuller view  Minneapolis Star Tribune
  5. New evidence of Trump coup: Second order drafted to seize voting machines  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Then-President Donald Trump was directly involved in efforts to use national security agencies to seize voting machines after his 2020 election loss, pressing his lawyer to make queries as advisers drafted two versions of a related executive order, media reports said.
